verses.roman:
tāṅhāra prabhāva-prema jāne dui-jane
ānibe prabhure ebe niścaya kailā mane

synonyms: tāṅhāra—his; prabhāva—influence; prema—love of Godhead; jāne—know; dui-jane—both of them; ānibe prabhure—he will bring Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ebe—now; niścaya kailā mane—they were greatly assured within their minds.
translation: Śivānanda and Jagadānanda knew of Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī's influence and love of Godhead. Therefore they now felt assured that he would certainly bring Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
